title: Kodak Might Have to Shut Down After 133 Years
snippet: Kodak might have to cease its operations since it does not have the funds to pay off its upcoming $500 million loan.

title: Eastman Kodak shares tumble as Q2 earnings swing to loss
snippet: Investing.com -- Eastman Kodak Company (NYSE: KODK) shares tumbled 10% after the company reported a significant earnings decline, swinging to a net loss in the second quarter of 2025 as it continues to navigate challenging market conditions.

title: Kodak at risk of closure after 133 years in business
snippet: One of the world's most iconic photography industry Eastman Kodak is at a crossroads!A 133-year-old photography company has recently told investors in its earning report that it may not be able to continue operating for much longer.
